com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers

Class GalleryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers.GalleryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FController

    public class GalleryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FController
    Mediates between the GalleryActivity and the DBManager by creating HashMaps of pictures to be displayed in the Gallery View.

    Can be constructed using an album name as a String or a Collection of tags as Strings.

    Author:
    Isaac Matichuk
    See Also:
    SQLiteDBManager, GalleryActivity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GalleryManager(Context context, GalleryData gallery)
      Constructor, sets current GalleryData and initializes the context This GalleryData is used for querying the database for a gallery of pictures

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GalleryData getGallery()
      gets the GalleryData object currently being used by this GalleryManager
      Picture getPhoto(int pid)
      Finds a Picture with the given pid in the database and returns it.
      java.util.Collection<Picture> getPictureGallery()
      Invokes the DBManager to return a set of Picture objects based on whether GalleryManager was contructed with an album name or a set of tags.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the title of the current GalleryManager, as to be displayed in the Gallery screen.
      boolean isAlbum()
      Determines whether the current Gallery Manager represents an album or is a collection of related Pictures that are not in the same album.
      void setContext(Context context)
      Sets the current GalleryManager's Context.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public void setContext(Context context)
        Sets the current GalleryManager's Context. A context is necessary if the database is going to be used. The context is set upon creation of the manager object but this context is invalidated as soon as the user leaves the screen so every activity that stores a manager needs to update the context on resume
        Parameters:
        Context -

      • getGallery

        public GalleryData getGallery()
        gets the GalleryData object currently being used by this GalleryManager
        Returns:
        GalleryData

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the title of the current GalleryManager, as to be displayed in the Gallery screen.
        Returns:
        String

      • getPhoto

        public Picture getPhoto(int pid)
        Finds a Picture with the given pid in the database and returns it.
        Parameters:
        pid - ID of picture to be returned.
        Returns:
        Picture object

      • getPictureGallery

        public java.util.Collection<Picture> getPictureGallery()
        Invokes the DBManager to return a set of Picture objects based on whether GalleryManager was contructed with an album name or a set of tags.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of HashMaps representing a set of Picture objects

      • isAlbum

        public boolean isAlbum()
        Determines whether the current Gallery Manager represents an album or is a collection of related Pictures that are not in the same album.
        Returns:
        boolean
